Articles.Content:
Here are the files to add OPM to K2. This is a small mod to add compatibility between Outer Planets Mod and K2 system resize. This contain 1 configuration file and a folder containing the enlarged ScaledSpace files for Kittopia. This does NOT redistribute ANY files from other authors and will only work when installed with the corresponding mods. Enjoy

License

This mod is licensed CC-BY-NC-SA
This mod should be added to K2 as an optional install
I would but I feel I would be able to keep it updated easier. Plus I plan to expand the mod and add compatiblity to all KT planet packs.
